answers.answer: I have taken care of diabetic for over 30 years.  I have never heard of this complaint.  See an ophthalmologist.Dr. O.

question: I have diabetes. After I eat of course I knock out. When I can finally force my self to wake up. I see yellow. My hands look yellow. The papers in front of me look yellow. Then if fades away within a few minutes.
title: Seeing yellow after nap????
